name: Demon Festival
description:
It's festival time, and demons are running wild. Use fast reflexes and three different powerups to your advantage, and rack up multi-hits to increase your multiplier and score! Loosely based on Japanese folklore.

Programming, Art Assistance: joh (https://twitter.com/joh_dev)

Art Design, UI Design: ilusetokaiba (https://twitter.com/ilusetokaiba)
